title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world March 30
description: Newfoundland and Saskatchewan have recorded its first deaths from the coronavirus, while an Ontario care facility for seniors is devastated by nine deaths. Hard-hit New York City is constructing a field hospital in Central Park. Get the latest on what's happe…
